### libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Import data

```{r}
xdata <- read.csv("data/tested_dogs.csv", header = TRUE) %>% 
  na.omit
```

### Plots


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot.data <- xdata %>%
  mutate(choice=ifelse(choice_letter == "A", 1, 0)) %>% 
  group_by(condition)%>%
  summarise(mean.correct=mean(choice), sd.correct=sd(choice), sum.correct=sum(choice), median.correct=median(choice), n.correct=length(choice), se.correct=sd(choice)/sqrt(length(choice)))
plot.data

p.choice<-ggplot(
  data=plot.data, aes(x=condition, y=mean.correct)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", alpha=0.5)+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean.correct-se.correct, ymax=mean.correct+se.correct), width=.2) +
  #ylim(0,0.8)+
  #geom_signif(comparisons=list(c("False Belief", #"True Belief")), annotations="*",
 #             y_position = 0.75, tip_length = 0.04, #vjust=0.4) +
  theme_classic()+
  labs(x="Experimental group",y="Proportion of bucket A choices")#+
  #ggtitle("Border Collies (N=40)")
 p.choice
```
